name: Marc Kjerland
body:
### About Me

![Image of Marc in front of mural in Chicago](images/marc-saga-mural.jpg)

I am a postdoctoral researcher at the [Maritime/Coastal Disaster Section](http://www.coast.dpri.kyoto-u.ac.jp/) of the [Disaster Prevention Research Institute](http://www.dpri.kyoto-u.ac.jp/en/) at Kyoto University. My current project is storm surge simulation and the impacts of climate change on coastal hazards. 

Here is my [curriculum vitae](CV-Marc-Kjerland.pdf).

### Contact 
E-mail: marc.kjerland at gmail

This page is under construction!
